description.ko: 디지털 붕괴의 영속적인 상태에 갇힌 거대한 구조물을 묘사한 흑백 기하학적 추상화.
description.en: A black and white geometric abstraction depicting a monumental structure caught in a perpetual state of digital disintegration.

prompt: A massive, brutalist obsidian #1A1A1A monument frozen in the middle of a recursive glitch, fracturing into a cascade of sharp geometric shards and vertical #C0C0C0 scanlines against a stark #FFFFFF void. The composition features high-contrast monochrome complexity with #808080 digital noise textures. 8k resolution, Octane Render, raytraced reflections on shifting black glass surfaces. Razor-sharp shadows emphasize the chaos within order, capturing the perfect balance created by fragments of a collapsing digital reality.
